title: Fushigi Mahou Fun Fun Pharmacy
original_name: ふしぎ魔法 ファンファン・ファーマシィー
opening_song: "Popuri wa Nikoniko Genki (ぽぷりはにこにこ元気)" composed by Akiko Kosaka
ending_song: "Shiawase Hitotsu Futatsu... (しあわせ一つ二つ...)" by Hiroko Konishi
sinopse: In a small town, there is a small pharmacy called Fun Fun Parmacy. Popuri, a girl who recently moved in downtown, discovers this pharmacy and meets Miss Fukiko, who is actually a witch. Miss Fukiko gives Popuri a mysterious bottle that can create magic spirits.
